title: spigot 1.12.2 经常性卡死 目测线程问题
author: wula233
txt_content:
服务器版本：spigot 1.12.2 
问题描述：经常性出现卡死。只装了4个插件，应该不是插件的问题。
日志如下：
[05:14:48] [AutoSaveWorld AutoSaveThread/INFO]: AutoSave Complete [05:15:58] [AutoSaveWorld AutoSaveThread/INFO]: AutoSaving [05:18:23] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: The server has stopped responding! [05:18:48] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Please report this to http://www.spigotmc.org/ [05:18:57] [Spigot Watchdog Thread/ERROR]: Be sure to include ALL relevant console errors and Minecraft crash replies.author: wula233
replies.txt_content:
181821 发表于 2020-4-8 16:18
你把内存调低点
感觉内存够用的呀，总2G的RAM，我直接默认分配的1G应该不会有太大的问题吧

wula233 发表于 2020-4-8 16:20
感觉内存够用的呀，总2G的RAM，我直接默认分配的1G应该不会有太大的问题吧 ...
试试吗、把

replies.author: wula233
replies.txt_content: 不太行。还是会卡死线程崩溃，这次卡了半小时，无奈拉闸重启

replies.author: Jeven
replies.txt_content: 什么CPU啊  可能是主频太低了
